title: S3cco
author: S3cco
content: Blockchain Life 2022 | 14-15 September 2022 | Moscow, RussiaEvent Website: https://blockchain-life.com/europe/en/One of the biggest blockchain, cryptocurrencies and mining events in the world, 6000 attendees, 100 booths.The forum is created for industry professionals and those who are taking their first steps. One phrase or acquaintance at the forum can change your life completely.

comments.author: S3cco
comments.body: Moscow will bring together major representatives of the crypto-industry on 14-15 September https://bitcoingarden.org/moscow-will-bring-together-major-representatives-of-the-crypto-industry-on-14-15-september/ A record 6,000 people will meet in Moscow at the Blockchain Life 2022 global forum on cryptocurrencies and mining.Blockchain Life 2022, the 9th International Cryptocurrency and Mining Forum, will be held in Moscow on 14-15 September.The event will bring together industry professionals, government officials and those just starting their journey: traders, miners, crypto and classic business entrepreneurs, investors, blockchain developers and many others.The current economic situation has affected absolutely all of the country’s citizens – hence the diversity of the forum’s guests. They will all be looking for new business contacts, insights and knowledge to dive into today’s most promising field....

comments.author: Tim101
comments.body: will there be an option to attend virtually?
